title: Drawing, "The River Darro, Granada", 1870–75
medium: Graphite, pen and blue ink, brush and blue and gray washes
description: Verticle rectangle. Water and two figures in foreground. Backs of houses and porches on both sides of the stream. A bridge over the water and other bridges beyond.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The River Darro, Granada", 1870–75.
1870–75. Graphite, pen and blue ink, brush and blue and gray washes. Gift of Mrs. Samuel Colman. 1939-85-106.
